name: Intrigue (Game Jam)
description:
Created for the UofM ACM GameJam as part of HackMemphis 2016.

The Game Jam's theme was "Enemies Are Weapons." So we came up with the idea of being a spy at a dinner party. You have a target to kill, but you have to convince someone else to kill him for you.

Features:

  • Party guests wander the area based on their needs. (Need a drink? Go to the bar. Need a toilet? Go to the bathroom?)
  • Pickpocket items from guests and plant them on others!
  • A laser grid that kills people who have contraband items!
  • An assassin looking for her target dossier. Can you get to her before her handler does?
  • Funky Jazz music
  • AAA mode so you can feel like you have that million dollar budget!


Team members in no particular order

  • Justin Palmer - Level Design
  • Elliot Boyette - 2D Artist
  • Devitt Upkins - Developer
  • Jonathan Schrack - Developer
  • Stephen Young - 3D Modelling (and magic C# fixer)
  • Jonathan Marlin - Music Composer
